name: The Ace Pilot's Bad Idea
description:
The Ace Pilot's Bad Idea Code, concept and story by Heartbox1
Music by Devin Chin
Pixel art by TheAtrxcity
Sound effects by EclipseMT We recommend zooming the page out if it doesn't fit in your screen.  We are working on an executable version of the game with Wwise integration for a better audio experience.  Description

You're an ace pilot on a mission. You're out of fuel, but you've got an idea... 

Controls

or to move left
or to move right
or to dash upwards after the meter is charged
  or  to detonate mines when you are within their blast radius, launching you in the opposite direction (hopefully upwards)

Reviews

"This is worse than getting over it"
- Baldest Knight

"Why are you making me play this game please let me go"
- Willing participant

"Haha mines go boom"
- Keltfire

Thanks for playing our game!
